quote: I bet, there was very little coverage — I bet it's brand new information to people that President Obama had a six-month ban on the Iraqi refugee program after two Iraqis came here to this country, were radicalized — and they were the masterminds behind the Bowling Green massacre. I mean, most people don't know that because it didn't get covered.
quotePlain: I bet, there was very little coverage — I bet it’s brand new information to people that President Obama had a six-month ban on the Iraqi refugee program after two Iraqis came here to this country, were radicalized — and they were the masterminds behind the Bowling Green massacre. I mean, most people don’t know that because it didn’t get covered.
name: Kellyanne Conway

checks.quote:
Most importantly, there was no "massacre" in or around Bowling Green that was either carried out or attempted.

In addition, while the two men were charged with serious crimes and were sentenced accordingly, it’s important to remember that everything that happened was part of a sting operation by the FBI. This means that the people of Bowling Green were not endangered at any point, and that the entire incident can be viewed as a law-enforcement success.
checks.short: … there was no "massacre" in or around Bowling Green that was either carried out or attempted.

This means that the people of Bowling Green were not endangered at any point, and that the entire incident can be viewed as a law-enforcement success.

claims.title: Bowling Green Massacre
claims.negative: there was no Bowling Green Massacre
claims.negativePlain: there was no Bowling Green Massacre
